website_summaries.verdict: These collectible Mister Rogers dolls will appeal to adults and children alike, and will appreciate in value.
pros: Three 0.75-inch tall dolls, packaged for collectors
Other Mister Rogers' Neighborhood characters also available
Funko Pop dolls often increase in value over time
cons: Quality issues with paint and construction
Box may arrive in less than collectible condition

customer_reviews.title: BEST. FUNKO. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: “If you could only sense how important you are to the lives of those you meet; how important you can be to the people you may never even dream of. There is something of yourself that you leave at every meeting with another person.” ― Fred Rogers
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Kline

customer_reviews.title: DELIGHTFUL TRIIBUTE TO A BELOVED AMERICAN ICON
customer_reviews.text: We need Mr. Rogers today! Most people of a certain age have fond memories of Mr. Rogers, a true American hero who taught kindness to kids and adults alike and that we are all great just as we are. I saw this Funko Pop Mr. Rogers and had to have it. Funko Pop figures are hit and miss in my book with their oversized head and no mouth. Some are really cute and the Mr. Rogers version is really a great tribute to this fantastic man. Here he holds a trademark trolley. It's well down and a nice trip down memory lane.
customer_reviews.author: Jack  Levic

customer_reviews.title: It's a Beautiful Day In The Neighborhood Again!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter grew up on Mr. Roger's Neighborhood. He was such a good influence on her and she looked forward to watching him and all his characters on a daily basis. This Pop is a way of remembering such a TV Icon. Thank you for allowing us and millions of other fans to relive those great days.
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: One of TV's Greats Honored at Last for my Children (8,7, and 3) to Play With.
customer_reviews.text: Fred Rogers is one of television's great artists. A man of compassion, common sense, and honor who bestowed relentless dignity on an audience who deserved it - our children. The show is smart, inquisitive, and respectful. I am glad to have this toy for my children to play with, and one for Dad, so he can remember the values and grace with which this thoughtful man lived his life. Thank you, Mr. Rogers.
customer_reviews.author: CWCTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Mr Rogers is home ☺️
customer_reviews.text: Just received and am having tons of flashbacks of Mr Rogers neighborhood episodes I watched as a kid. Pop is not a bobble just the regular figure kind. Same sizing as other pops and colors are perfect. I’m not terribly picky about detailing being exact and what not so I will mention that there is some stray brown/gray coloring around both ears. Looks like the spray machine strayed from the hairline a bit but again not a big deal to me (see pictures). I’m very happy with my purchase and Mr Rogers is a great addition to my desk set up.
customer_reviews.author: RoxShinobi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any Pittsburgh collection.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to add to our guest room, which is Pittsburgh themed. Mister Rodgers coming from Pittsburgh make the perfect end table addition. This is a really great Funko Pop figure. The detail on the trolly is great, noting "Neighborhood Trolley" at the top in small text, just like the show. As 2018 is the 50th anniversary of Mister Rodgers Neighborhood, this is the perfect addition!
customer_reviews.author: Gina G.

customer_reviews.title: Why does my Funko box need a shower?
customer_reviews.text: Funko box covered in goo. Opened the shipping box to find the inside of box & the Funko box covered in some sort of goo...cream, lotion, god knows what. The Funko was the only ordered item in the box. The Mister Rogers Funko itself wasn't soiled or damaged & it is cute. Definitely not giftable in this state. Luckily, my son didn't care about box since he wants to play with the Funko, not just display it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t you be my neighbor?
customer_reviews.text: Mister Rogers, like with many people out there, has held a special place in my heart. In my mind, “The Man Upstairs” brought home this kind, gentle soul too soon and we have not received a replacement to truly show future generations how to live neighborly lives. RIP Mister Rogers. This piece from Funko Pop has brought Mister Rogers into my home.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Why not Mr. Rogers? I say finally Mr. Rogers!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, Mr. Rogers!! Not a monster, superhero or gaming character. Mr. Rogers is getting the spotlight most people have only heard about. Good to see quality people can also get noticed outside the studio or from a child's view. Going to see the documentary about him also when it becomes local or wait until I can purchase it on Blu-Ray!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Left out in the rain but it's still nice.
customer_reviews.text: USPS left this out in the rain despite having a key to a package box. The box and product box got drenched but Amazon Customer Service is always the best and gave me a refund. I liked the detail of the Funko Pop Mr. Rogers. I'll be honest, the face doesn't really look like him but this is common with Funko Pop. One look at the sweater and the beautifully detailed trolley and you know who he is!
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bound

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is nutz for Mr. Rogers. Found a cool lunchbox, but wanted one other item. This Funko figure did the trick. Good size, well molded and painted, and durable. It's also Funk POP!, so now the kid is cutting edge. This was welcome in our Neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Pop Bop

customer_reviews.title: Well made and adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for anyone who adores Mister Rogers and his legacy! I bought this along with a Daniel Tiger 5 Minute Bedtime Stories book for my kids (but of course, I commandeered Mister Rogers. :)) and they loved it. Mister Rogers alone would be cute but with the trolley in his hands, it's the best!
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: It's a baeutiful day in the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Mister Rogers? A big part of many generations childhoods even today. This little POP brings back warm childhood memories every time I look at it. If Mister Rogers and his neighborhood are a part of your childhood memories than get this and have a small memory of better times.
customer_reviews.author: David L Belleman JR.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Mr. Roger's
customer_reviews.text: My son is going to be 40, we got this and a t-shirt and Mr. Roger's sox for his birthday. His special friend as a toddler was Mr. Rogers. He couldn't wait to watch him and sat still and quiet listening to every word. This was a hero to everyone who knew him and especially our little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Ralphie

customer_reviews.title: A great little reminder to be kind and gentle every day
customer_reviews.text: SUPER CUTE!!! Love him from his slightly greying hair down to his adorable little sneakers. I keep Fred on my desk as a great reminder to be gentle and kind. Get it now -- he has a documentary coming out, and these things are going to fly off the shelves. - T
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Venette

customer_reviews.title: It is what I expected and what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I find these items cute, and bought this as a gift. I think they are vastly overpriced for what they are and not buy them if my child was not collecting them. As it is, we don't allow him to "go crazy" with his collection or spend hundreds of dollars on them.
customer_reviews.author: M. G. Muters

customer_reviews.title: What Would Fred Rogers Do?
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty darned adorable. Plus, it's a nice little reminder to be kind to others. Adopting a little Mr. Rogers into your life is always a good thing. There will never be another Mister Rogers Neighborhood, he is sorely missed.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Won't you be my neighbor
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, even though Funko has a unique uniform look, Somehow Fred comes through, paint apps aren't great, but they're ok. The trolley isn't as accurate as I would have liked, but it fits more of a cartoon aesthetic looking like the wooden trolley toy (Holgate HZ6161 Classic Trolley) rather than the show prop
customer_reviews.author: Silver Tiger

customer_reviews.title: I love Mr. Rogers, and had to add this Funko Pop to my collection!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Mr. Rogers Funko Pop. He is holding the neighborhood trolley (ok, I think it would have been better if he had his Daniel Tiger puppet on his hand, but oh well). Great value for the price! I coupled this purchase along with DVD documentary "Will you be my neighbor".
customer_reviews.author: NPR MANTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Won't you?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and kept it in the box because otherwise I figured out I'd have to explain who it was and what he was carrying. Funko isn't always great about getting the likeness, which is often subordinated to the general style. The good news is now I have Mr. Rodgers here, and he will always be my neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Edgar Mihelic, MBA

customer_reviews.title: Great tribute to Mr. Rogers
customer_reviews.text: Love having this on my desk as a reminder of how great he was!
customer_reviews.author: HDN

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Rogers is The Best
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the cutest figures I've ever purchased. The trolley the figurine is holding is amazing and the little details are perfect. I was a little worried he wouldn't stand up on his own since there isn't a base included, but he does! He's actually very well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: A. McK.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Gift for Teacher
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a teacher! He absolutely loved it. You cannot go wrong with Mr. Rogers. I might even get one for myself as I really loved the look of him holding the train.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Kidle

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: While I really wanted this POP, I was slightly disappointed in the condition of the box. By now, most retailers know that the box shouldn’t be crushed as it is part of the collectible. This one unfortunately was crushed on one end.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Recznik

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product, no returns
customer_reviews.text: Damaged funko box-- straight up ripped down the side, AMAZON box is fine so it was obviously packed already ripped, and when I try to open a return/exchange it says NO RETURNS.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Poor paint job
customer_reviews.text: I’m starting to get kind of frustrated with Funko’s quality. I have noticed as the years have gone on that their paint job, and the overall construction of the figures has gone down. This frustrates me because I remember when they were really good quality. Now they’ve tried to cut corners, and they’re going to lose customers if they keep this up.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lucas

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Beautiful Day for my collection!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo happy. Some of the other shops on here can be touch and go on quality but my figure arrived in PERFECT condition. I am excited for mister Rogers to join my collection as he was worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.author: orangelemons

customer_reviews.title: Hello neighbor!
customer_reviews.text: I collect these figures ( not sure why) and I was smitten when I realized they had a Mr. Rogers figures. I had to have it. Now he sits on my shelf with my Bob Ross figure.
customer_reviews.author: Sans

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This Mr. Rogers Funko Pop is comparable in price to what it costs to buy one at Funko HQ, so no big markups here. He’s adorable and i plan to have him in my counseling office once we can resume in person work.
customer_reviews.author: catinseattle

customer_reviews.title: Great detail and a total blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: I love Funko Pop bobble heads and this one is one of my favorites. It brings back wonderful memories of watching this beloved show as a child. LOVE the detail!
customer_reviews.author: IRL

customer_reviews.title: He Stands There...
customer_reviews.text: ...reminding me what true a true Christ-like person is actually like, showing me and everyone how to be one. And reminding me that I'm an okay person, even if I can't live up to what I would like to.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Klunder

customer_reviews.title: Please won't you be... my neighbor?
customer_reviews.text: When I was a little kid, I was catching a little attention to Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Then, last year, I went to see A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood and I love the attention to Tom Hanks portraying Fred Rogers. Now, this Pop I own is a must-have for any Mister Rogers' Neighborhood fan!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Anania

customer_reviews.title: One of the best desk decors
customer_reviews.text: I grew up watching Mr. Rogers Neighborhood and knew I had to buy his Funko Pop when it came out. It's study and the colors are accurate to what you'd see in his original episodes.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Portrayal
customer_reviews.text: I am a life-long fan of Mr. R. Never stopped watching his shows, made a pilgrimage to a small museum in PA, read books about him, by him, had a print of him on my wall. This is a sweet little Funko portraying a sweet man. Hopefully his foundation gets some of the profits!
customer_reviews.author: Alias Sobriquet

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love Mr. Rogers and wanted to get something for my office to remind me of his kindness and wisdom. This is a great little piece.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia P.

customer_reviews.title: Box arrived damaged-dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift and the box arrived damaged and dented. It would be embarrassing to gift it in its present condition. I attempted to replace, however, the item is not eligible for a return or replacement. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Love this POP
customer_reviews.text: Warning- my box came damaged and I know that can be a deal breaker for collectors, it was packaged with other items. I bought this for my classroom so he will not be staying in the box. So cute! I love Mr. Rogers and this was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: alvinanddiane

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY FOR MR ROGERS FANS!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this Funko collectible of Mr Rogers!!!! I bought it for a family member that collects anything and everything Mr Rogers. He was blown away! It’s a must buy for any Mr Rogers collecter/lover!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a Funko POP guy, but when I saw this, I had to have it for my music studio. It's a great reminder of the great man! Also, it helped that I just saw Won't You Be My Neighbor? And was flooded with all sorts of good memories from as a child. Great job, Funko!
customer_reviews.author: FilmComposer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Figure of a Wonderful Dude
customer_reviews.text: A total gem. I loved Mr. Rogers and this figurine has such wonderful little touches, like his traditional sneakers. Perfect gift or desk decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Another one with defects.
customer_reviews.text: Was happy until I noticed the defects. Only time I seem to get pops with defects is when I buy from amazon........
customer_reviews.author: adam kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful day in the neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful day in the neighborhood. Put Fred Rogers on your shelf helps remind you to be kind and accepting of others. Great addition to any Funko Pop collection.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Tozzi

customer_reviews.title: Item damaged on arrival and can't replace or return?!
customer_reviews.text: Would have loved the product if it wasn't half crushed when I got it. And they won't accept returns or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Brea W.

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet tribute to such a big hearted man
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured and very nice quality. I love this little tribute to one of my childhood favorites.
customer_reviews.author: KiKiNi

customer_reviews.title: Love MR Rogers
customer_reviews.text: These is super cute. I love Mr. Rogers and this fits on my shelf of Pop figures quite well
customer_reviews.author: Jess Usher

customer_reviews.title: Memories and happy times!!
customer_reviews.text: Memories for grandson something to remind him of Mr Rodgers and the time he spent learning with him!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA D

customer_reviews.title: Holding the Trolley too cool.
customer_reviews.text: Growing to become a big fan of the Funko Pops and bought the one as a gift, and one for my collection. The box arrived in great shape and the figure will make a big impact in my Pop Icon collection. Love the little green sweater and the Trolly.
customer_reviews.author: DiscGolfnWookie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure package is sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom flap was out of box. Was hoping that the box would have been sealed tight.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Love these figures.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Funko Pop collectable. These are so well made and the PERFECT size for displaying on your shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: It's a beautiful day for my POP collection
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Paint job could have been better on Trolley but other than that he's a perfect tribute to a childhood favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff  🚑 & Jeff's Wife 💅Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Mr. Rogers fan
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled upon this adorable figure and thought it was great for my son. He usely gets the superheroes and was pleased to add Mr. Rogers.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3

customer_reviews.title: Great Funko Pop
customer_reviews.text: A well made funko pop. You will love this if you are a funko collector. It looks great with my other pops.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Andy

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like Mr. Rogers!
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a huge fan! I LOVED the show as a kid so I bought this as a sort of nostalgic gift to myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a gift and the person loved it. Durable and very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: aDdY2017

customer_reviews.title: It's A Wonderful Day in my Neighborhood now that I have this.
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge fan of Mister Rogers growing up. I pre-ordered this as soon as I saw it. It is a great design and love the Trolley being included.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey H. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and perfect gift but didn’t need it anymore as friend had received same item on day of party :/ now I can’t return and I’m stuck with a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Won't you be my neighbor?
customer_reviews.text: Love my Pops! Love Mr. Rogers! Had to add him to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife after watching the movie. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brings back childhood memories
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't pass this up. Mr. Rogers was a favorite of my son's when he was young.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Rogers is well made
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Rogers is able to stand up and he doesn’t constantly fall Great design and very adorable Well made
customer_reviews.author: Eira

customer_reviews.title: Great little figure of Mr Rogers!
customer_reviews.text: I had seen Funko POP! figures and they seemed pretty cool. Then I saw they had made one of Mr Rogers and it was on sale on Amazon so I bought it and it has been a fun addition to the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect Christmas gift. It’s cute and classic!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received in perfect condition. I was relieved because we have received ...
customer_reviews.text: Received in perfect condition. I was relieved because we have received some pretty poor quality Pops from Amazon before (The Ian "Malcom" Pop was absolutely horrible), but this one passes with flying colors. Not to mention, Fred Rogers was a humble, gentle, and admirable man who lived a life worth commemorating.
customer_reviews.author: dodbod

customer_reviews.title: Fred is such a cutie Funko!
customer_reviews.text: I love Mr Rogers and this Funko is a perfect t representation of my main man Fred.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: My Very Own Fred Rogers to Love
customer_reviews.text: He's too adorable. I miss the real Fred Rogers, though.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.L.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pop!
customer_reviews.text: He's perfect! Just the sweetest little pop. The details are fantastic, from the little tennis shoes to the ribbing around the cuffs and hem of the sweater. Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: My favorite thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: When I see my Funko Pop Mr. Rogers I'm reminded what a wonderful man he was, and how much he influenced me to be a good person. It really warms my heart.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Bleu

customer_reviews.title: Won’t You Be My Neighbor?
customer_reviews.text: I always loved Mr. Rogers. Having him as a Funk O Pop on my desk is AwesomeSauce! He came well packaged. Lol, everyone in my office knew exactly who he was!
customer_reviews.author: Sanielle DeBois

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: came quickly and with no damage to the Pop or the box!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Could have been packaged better
customer_reviews.text: The product could have been better protected in the box. To avoid damage to the Pop Figure inside. Overall a great looking Funko Pop I got as a gift for my wifes boss.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Painting quality is almost perfect. One noticeable flaw in his pants, small area missing grey color. Otherwise very good. Can read neighborhood trolly on top of trolly, see grey in his hair, & detail of shoe laces on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels_OfTheHeart

customer_reviews.title: He has the trolly
customer_reviews.text: It’s Funko and Mr. Rogers. What else can you say?
customer_reviews.author: archemedes

customer_reviews.title: Won't you be my neighbor?
customer_reviews.text: This world needs more Fred McFeely Rogers'!! A POP to make you smile every day!!
customer_reviews.author: nbgrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice funko
customer_reviews.text: I like this funko I use to watch the show
customer_reviews.author: roscow

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to my classroom!
customer_reviews.text: I love having my childhood hero nearby in my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Fine Things

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Just the cutest, most perfect addition to my computer's neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Capehart

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love? My favorite neighbor gets to hang out right on my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Tv
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular Funko Pop for my 23 year old son. He grew up watching Mr. Rogers. But everyone in the small town he lives in doesn't know who Mr. Rogers is. So now he can show them
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Graham

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: my kids collect these - this will make a nice addition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome figure!
customer_reviews.text: I love this figure! Perfect size for the living room mantle.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Merovich

customer_reviews.title: My childhood!
customer_reviews.text: What a great Funko Pop! He doesn't fit in with our others at all but he's perfect ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Brissa

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Mr. Rogers was my fav growing up!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I will keep shopping for all your great deals. Thank it
customer_reviews.text: I want to thank you for getting our pop to us so quickly after the problem we had. I will keep shopping for all your great deals. Thank it. We love it
customer_reviews.author: silly

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: For some reason my 37 year old husband loves these things. He likes this one too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved it, the box was a bit damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality- clear character
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in an homage to Mr. Rogers.
customer_reviews.author: adhrutgers

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite funk pop neighbor!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a funko pop collector. I have a few things in my room that I appreciate and care about. I wanted something that was small and reminded me of Mister Rogers. I got this and I absolutely love it. He’s my hero and I really like this. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Krizia Walker

customer_reviews.title: Mr Rogers one of a kind
customer_reviews.text: Love me Rogers wish more people were like him and that they still had place for this type of tv
customer_reviews.author: John P Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgic fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift to go with a Bob Ross POP and complete the pair of PBS 80/90s icons.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Because not everything is a dumpster fire
customer_reviews.text: It's delightfully innocent and wonderful. Even if you don't collect Funko POP figures, consider this one to remind you that there's good in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Tallman

customer_reviews.title: Pure Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Rogers was a huge part of my growing up years, so when I saw it I knew I wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't you be my neighbor? Hi! Neighbor!😊
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love mr. Rogers great packaging great product came shift properly highly recommended great for the collector child of the 70s and 80s.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Carter

customer_reviews.title: Won't you be my neighbor?
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful part of my childhood now sits on a shelf with other things that bring me joy. I love Funko for making so many awesome figures.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Neighbor
customer_reviews.text: I love this figurine. It sits nicely on my shelf and reminds me of my childhood and the importance of being kind to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives me Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Box quality was near mint, which was awesome. I love this pop.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Paint
customer_reviews.text: Cute , box came in good condition, and size is consistent to other Funko pop. But this was just lazy sloppy painting. (Trolly & shoes)
customer_reviews.author: gaby granados

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Item was not in good condition. The item container was ripped & smashed. Wish I could return because I'm very disappointed in the condition of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRICE, EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: FUNKO POPS - LOVE THEM. I HAVE LOVED THEM SINCE THEY BEGAN. GREAT LIKENESS OF AN ICONIC and LOVABLE PERSON - FRED ROGERS aka Mr. Rogers. BUY THIS ONE if you were part of the Mr. Rogers generation.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ranelli

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: It's Mr. Rogers, I have noting bad to say about it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Evans

customer_reviews.title: CUTE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to collect. Very cute, and the trolley Mr. Rogers is holding is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Funko POP! TV: Mr. Rogers Mr Rogers Collectible Figure, Multicolor
product_meta.description: From Mr. Rogers Neighborhoo, Mr. Rogers, as a stylized POP vinyl from Funko! Figure stands 3 3/4 inches and comes in a window display box. Check out the other Mr. Rogers Neighborhoo figures from Funko! Collect them all!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars1,181 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
